test_connect.label: Connection
test_connect.comment: Please Save Client ID and Secret Key Before Test. Generate/Refresh New Token.

show_books.label: Address Books To Show
show_books.comment: Choose additional address books to show in addition to the Magento General Subscription list.

fields_to_show.label: Data Fields To Show
fields_to_show.comment: Only data fields with visibility public can be shown to customers. You can create more data fields within the Data Mapping section.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.comment: Select if a contact can join/unsubscribe from the address book via the unsubscribe page

customer_data.label: Data Fields Mapping
customer_data.comment: AUTOMAP AVAILABLE IN DEVELOPER SECTION TO MAP ALL DATAFIELDS.

datafield_default.label: Default Value
datafield_default.comment: When sending a campaign that uses template personalisation, a default value ensures that a value is alwasy displayed even if a data field is blank.

datafield_access.label: Visibility
datafield_access.comment: Make the field public if you want to allow your contacts to view and amend the data you hold on them in this field.

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: SWEET TOOTH EXTENSION HAS TO BE INSTALLED AND ENABLED IN ORDER TO USE THIS FEATURE.

delay.label: Delay Period (Days)
delay.comment: The system will send the reminder after the above mentioned amount of days upon order status selected above.

new_product.label: New Product Only
new_product.comment: Only include not purchased before products only.

anchor.label: Reviews Anchor
anchor.comment: Please provide the anchor used on product pages for reviews e.g. #reviews

passcode.label: Passcode
passcode.comment: Recommended: Set a passcode so that basket contents and coupon codes can only be viewed if the following passcode is sent with the request.

best_sellers_url.label: Best Sellers URL
best_sellers_url.comment: add category_id/@CATEGORY_ID@ at the end of url to filter best sellers by category

most_viewed_url.label: Most Viewed URL
most_viewed_url.comment: add category_id/@CATEGORY_ID@ at the end of url to filter most viewed by category

products_chooser_button.comment: Click To Open Product Chooser. After Choosing Products Save Config.
Click To Open Product Chooser. After Choosing Products Save Config.

dynamic_url.label: Recommendation URL
dynamic_url.comment: Replace @SLOT_NAME@ with the slot name created in your Nosto account.

logon.label: Feefo Logon
logon.comment: This is what you provided Feefo during account setup and is usually your website domain name.

reviews_per_product.label: Reviews Per Product
reviews_per_product.comment: Number of reviews to display per product.

service_score_url.label: Service Score URL
service_score_url.comment: Enter Feefo logon above before using this URL.

product_reviews_url.label: Product Reviews URL
product_reviews_url.comment: Enter Feefo logon above before using this URL.

order_statuses.label: Import With Status
order_statuses.comment: Select multiple statuses by pressing Ctrl button while selecting

order_custom_attributes.label: Order Custom Attributes
order_custom_attributes.comment: Select custom order attributes that you want to import with your order data. Select multiple by pressing Ctrl button while selecting.

quote_custom_attributes.label: Quote Custom Attributes
quote_custom_attributes.comment: Select custom quote attributes that you want to import with your quote data. Select multiple by pressing Ctrl button while selecting.

email_capture.label: Easy Email Capture
email_capture.comment: Enable this if you have a checkout process that allows the visitor to enter their email address during the checkout, but it does not update quote table instantly.

limits.label: Abandoned Cart Limit
limits.comment: Do not send an abandoned cart email to a contact if they have received a previous abandoned cart email in previous x hours.

dynamic_syling.label: Dynamic Styling
dynamic_syling.comment: Styling entered here will apply to all dynamic content areas pulled from Magento. Classes References Used : 'product-table', 'product-name', 'product-price', 'product-url', 'other-text'

other_title.title: label
other_title.label: Other Text (Will Apply To Other Remaining Text)

memory_limit.label: Sync Memory Limit
memory_limit.comment: Set to NO to use system default memory.

shell.label: Run Abandoned Carts From Shell.
shell.comment:
Use the shell command to run the Abandoned baskets campaigns. Select YES to run separate cron like this :
*/5 * * * * /usr/bin/php /magentoroot/shell/connector.php -action baskets -mode all */5 * * * * /usr/bin/php /magentoroot/shell/connector.php -action baskets -mode customers */5 * * * * /usr/bin/php /magentoroot/shell/connector.php -action baskets -mode guests

setup_data_fields.label: Automap Data Fields
setup_data_fields.comment: Create Datafields In Connector And Map Them. Including Customer, Address And Sales Information.

delete_contact.label: Delete All Contact ID'S
delete_contact.comment: Remove the contact id's. When using different API username account from initial setup please click here to remove all.

reimport_customers.label: Refresh Customers
reimport_customers.comment: Mark all customers to be imported.

reimport_subscribers.label: Refresh Subscribers
reimport_subscribers.comment: Mark all subscribers to be imported.

reimport_orders.label: Refresh Orders Data
reimport_orders.comment: Mark all order data to be imported.

suppressed_contacts.label: Refresh Supressions
suppressed_contacts.comment: Refresh Historically Suppressed contacts for 10years period.

reimport_quotes.label: Refresh Quote Data
reimport_quotes.comment: Mark all quote data to be imported.

reimport_reviews.label: Refresh Review Data
reimport_reviews.comment: Mark all review data to be imported.

reimport_wishlist.label: Refresh Wishlist Data
reimport_wishlist.comment: Mark all wishlist data to be imported.

debug_enabled.label: Debug Mode
debug_enabled.comment: Log sync info into this file connector_api.log.

debug_api_calls.label: Debug All API Calls
debug_api_calls.comment: Log all API calls into the connector_api.log file, debug mode must be enabled.
